publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3708 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Finance Committee: Finance Committee - Stage 2 of the 2003-04 Budget Process-That the Parliament notes the 7th Report 2002 of the Finance Committee, Stage 2 of the 2003-04 Budget Process (SP Paper 709).
